page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: Only school here is the Voluntary Aided First School (Anglican) endowed by a local benefactor. It has 37 pupils aged 4+ to 10+ ( 2 classes: 20 infants, 17 juniors ), 2 full-time teachers + 1 part-time, a non-teching/ clerical assistant ( 2 hours daily),a mid- day supervisor and a cleaner. Children from Westhouse have free transport ( over 2 miles ) since the closure of their own school. Burton School has ample accommodation with spare rooms for art & craft, library & meals. There is a playing field. In summer term juniors learn to swim at Ingleton Pool. At 10+, pupils go to Ingleton Middle School & at 13+ to Settle High School. Independent Grammar School at Bentham. Further education is outside the area (Lancaster has University & colleges).
